name: iOS 14.4.1 and iPadOS 14.4.1
available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Clément Lecigne of Google’s Threat Analysis Group, Alison Huffman of Microsoft Browser Vulnerability Research
